availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Mary F. Travis Robards. Father of Nancy E. Robards, Martha J. Robards, Rufus H. Robards, Lucy F. Robards, Elmira E. Robards, and James H. Robards.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 2, p.1. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Tillotson's Precinct, p.5. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994027-994058. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. Find A Grave, "George McHenry Robards (1830-1903)," Memorial #72947977, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=72947977&ref=acom (accessed August, 29, 2017).
